duties_responsibilities.duty: Review bid proposals, ISOs, and specifications for construction projects.
Conduct site visits and prepare cost estimates for heavy industrial construction projects.
Collaborate with contractors and manage project budgets effectively.
Read and interpret ISOs, drawings, and specifications accurately.
Utilize advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Access for data analysis.
Work independently, manage multiple projects, and meet tight deadlines.
Communicate effectively and build relationships with clients, contractors, and suppliers.
